hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Mughaffal: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Were dogs not a species of creature I should command that they all be killed; but kill every pure black one

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي اتِّخَاذِ الْكَلْبِ لِلصَّيْدِ وَغَيْرِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Using A Dog For Hunting And Other Than That
